title: Bonus Episode: How technology is changing politics
itunes:title: Bonus Episode: How technology is changing politics
itunes:subtitle: In this special edition, produced by our friends from the Science Focus podcast, Jamie Susskind explains how the politics of the future will be shaped by the technology influencing our lives today.
description:
In this special edition, produced by our friends from the Science Focus podcast, Jamie Susskind explains how the politics of the future will be shaped by the technology influencing our lives today.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
